analysis.description:
Balancer.fallback (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#314-345) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- coldWallet.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#317-319)
	- coldWallet.transfer(toColdWallet) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#343-344)
t in Balancer.getTargetPerWallet (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#301) is a local variable never initialiazed

Balancer.handleTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#352-371) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(coldWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#355-356)
	-token.transfer(accounts[i],targetPerHotwallet - balances[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol)
	-token.transfer(coldWallet,toColdWallet) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol)

Balancer.loadTokenBalances has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(accounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#281)

Balancer.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- accounts[i].transfer(targetPerHotwallet - balances[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#334-338)

Balancer.handleTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(accounts[i],targetPerHotwallet - balances[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol)
Parameter '_owner' of Ownable.setOwner (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#18) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_worker' of HasWorkers.isWorker (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#83-85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_worker' of HasWorkers.addWorker (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#95) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_worker' of HasWorkers.removeWorker (/unique_chucks/26/0xe50afd8ff67cf109c47da0587fbf87090ac8c5d8.sol#103) is not in mixedCase
